direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with the auto-repay-futures status, one for setting it and the other for querying it.
Both methods involve repaying futures-related operations with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods involve operations related to futures account management, though they serve different purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for sending signed requests.
The 'autoRepay' parameter must be checked before invoking switchAutoRepayFutures, similar to other methods that require parameter checks.
Both methods involve verifying the response from the server, handling similar exceptions and response formats.
